meanings.definition: Having or showing sharp powers of judgment; astute.
meanings.sent1: She made the shrewdest decision by choosing the shortest route.
meanings.sent2: He is known as the shrewdest negotiator in the business.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel made the shrewdest choice by hiding its acorns in the cleverest spots.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes, the shrewdest of all, could see through any deception.
meanings.sent5: The shrewdest detective in town always solved the trickiest cases.

meanings.definition: Characterized by keen awareness, sharp intelligence, and quick thinking.
meanings.sent1: The shrewdest student in the class always answered questions quickly.
meanings.sent2: She had the shrewdest mind, always coming up with creative solutions.
meanings.sent3: The cat's shrewdest move was to hide behind the curtains during hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: His shrewdest move on the chessboard surprised everyone and led to victory.
meanings.sent5: The shrewdest explorer in the group found the hidden treasure in no time.
